root: ^(It feels like my body is sinking in mud. I try to move my hands to reach for something only for an elastic muk to hold me back.)
^(I try and try only to feel like I’m falling further down. My head starts to go under. I can’t breathe. I can’t see. I can’t move. No one is around to help me. I can’t-
^The room lights up in an instant, Connor in a completely different place than he was before. Rudolph is in the room as well, standing by the bed.
^Good to see you’re finally awake. I tried shaking you after I woke up, but you wouldn’t respond. That old bastard’s gone too far for his stupid game! You can’t just drug people!
^“Ugh. Guess he wanted his last game to be his most immersive one yet.
^Why couldn’t we simply get drunk and play Yahtzee?
^Locked in? Yeah. It needs a key.
^Have you been able to find anything?
^You heard the old bastard. You’re the detective of this stupid game. So go on. Detect.
^Right. I guess using your brain isn’t in a politician’s job description.
^(It seems the game has started. What do you havein store, Garry?)
